title: Community Yoga Session
description: Start your week with mindfulness and wellness. Join our certified yoga instructor for a relaxing session suitable for all skill levels. Bring your own mat and water bottle.

title: Kids Art & Craft Workshop
description: Creative workshop for children aged 5-12. Kids will learn to make colorful crafts using eco-friendly materials. All supplies provided. Parents welcome to assist younger children.

title: Rooftop Movie Night - Classic Bollywood
description: Join us for a nostalgic evening under the stars! We'll be screening classic Bollywood movies. Popcorn and refreshments will be served. Bring your own cushions and blankets for comfort.

title: Cooking Competition - Regional Delicacies
description: Showcase your culinary skills in our monthly cooking competition! This month's theme: Regional Indian delicacies. Prizes for top 3 dishes. Registration required by January 26th.

title: Senior Citizens Health Check-up Camp
description: Free health screening for senior residents. Services include blood pressure, diabetes screening, and general consultation. Conducted by qualified healthcare professionals from City Hospital.

title: Environmental Awareness Workshop
description: Learn about sustainable living practices, waste segregation, and eco-friendly alternatives. Interactive session with practical tips for reducing your carbon footprint. Suitable for all age groups.

title: Chess Tournament
description: Annual chess tournament for all skill levels. Separate categories for adults and children. Registration fee: ₹100. Prizes worth ₹5000 to be won! Register at the management office.

title: Valentine's Day Couple's Dance
description: Romantic evening for couples with live music and dance. Professional dance instructor will teach basic steps. Dinner and mocktails included. Advance booking required.

title: Financial Planning Seminar
description: Expert seminar on personal finance, investment options, and retirement planning. Certified financial planner will address queries. Refreshments provided. Registration recommended.

title: Garden Makeover Day
description: Community volunteering event to beautify our society garden. Planting new flowers, cleaning walkways, and setting up new seating areas. Gardening tools and refreshments provided.
